title: In order to verify the area, I have also carried out survey of the said plot through my Architect/ Licensed surveyor to ascertain the correctness of the area
clause_text: In order to verify the area, I have also carried out survey of the said plot through my Architect/ Licensed surveyor to ascertain the correctness of the area.
